title: Number of eSports games players worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
The maximum Number of players in millions 100.0 is found at Sport League of Legends and the minimum is found at StarCraft II where Sport is 2.4.
Sport StarCraft II has 41.67 times less Number of players in millions than Sport League of Legends which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Sport, and Number of players in millions in each Sport on the y axis.
The Number of players in millions is highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
The maximum Number of players in millions 100.0 is found at Sport League of Legends and the minimum is found at StarCraft II where Sport is 2.4.
Sport StarCraft II has 41.67 times less Number of players in millions than Sport League of Legends which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
The maximum Number of players in millions 100.0 is found at Sport League of Legends and the minimum is found at StarCraft II where Sport is 2.4.
The difference of Number of players in millions between the highest and lowest Sport is 97.6.
Number of players in millions at Sport League of Legends is 100.0 , second place is Call of Duty at 28.1, and thirdly is Hearthstone at 23.9.
Similar Number of players in millions is found in Sport World of Tanks, and FIFA 17.
The Sport League of Legends has 4.28 times more Number of players in millions than average.
The Number of players in millions is 210.3 if we add up values of all Sports.
